Row.Text: The Earth Kingdom is one of the world's four nations. Spanning most of a continent as well as several subsidiary islands, it is the largest and most populated sovereignty in the world and encompasses much of the eastern hemisphere. The kingdom operates as a monarchy under the rule of a single Earth Monarch, and has held strong through both imperial invasions and authoritarian uprisings.
From the impenetrable walls of Ba Sing Se, the Earth Kingdom steadies itself and prepares for the future.
